channel.title: Random notification keeps coming on iPhone!
channel.description:
[s]Hi,
I keep getting a random notification on my iPhone. It seems as if somebody is able to send me notifications somehow. I haven't got any weird apps installed and nobody had access to my phone.
Here's one of the notifications I got and this is what it looked like: [img]http://i.imgur.com/kysmjgr.jpg[/img]
The notification itself looks weird. Any ideas how this is done? I have a feeling of my friends is pulling a prank on me but it's really weird.
Help would be appreciated!
Edit: I forgot to mention, when that screen appears I can't use the home button to dismiss. I have to press the dismiss button. I have assistive touch turned on and I can't even double click home to view open apps or even open up notification centre etc. it's really weird and I need help![/s]
Found out how it was done. There's an app in the app store that allows you to do this.

item.title: Random notification keeps coming on iPhone!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Swaggerrrrrrrrrr! <3
Edit: guys, he’s actually srs about this :eek: :eek:

Read full topic
